name: Berean Standard Bible
text: That is, the seven-day period after the Passover during which no leaven may be eaten; see Exodus 12:14–20.

name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Abib was the first month of the ancient Hebrew lunar calendar, usually occurring within the months of March and April; twice in this verse.

name: Berean Standard Bible
text: That is, Shavuot, the late spring feast of pilgrimage to Jerusalem; it is also known as the Feast of Harvest (see Exodus 23:16) or the Feast of Pentecost (see Acts 2:1).

name: Berean Standard Bible
text: That is, Sukkot, the autumn feast of pilgrimage to Jerusalem; it is later called the Feast of Tabernacles (or Booths or Shelters).
